articles.author: Chloe Taylor, Hugh Leask
articles.title: European defense stocks rally after Trump comments on Ukraine; Saab adds 5% - CNBC
articles.description: European shares fell on Wednesday, as investors reacted to comments from the head of the Federal Reserve and an apparent shift on Ukraine from President Trump.
articles.content:
European shares edged lower on Wednesday morning, even as defense equities gained a boost from U.S. President Donald Trump's latest comments on the conflict in Ukraine.
